name: Believe In The Chaos
description:
Version 2 is out (CHECK IT OUT)

Patch Notes are in the DevLogs so go check those out.  I did a bunch of things.  The game seems to run alright now as well.   I probably didn't catch all of the patch notes either.  I was all over the place.  

I hope you enjoy the update!

This game was created for a game jam.  I only have 2 minutes left so submitting now.  Enjoy:) I find it fun.
